alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 10:06PM CDT until July 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dickinson County in central Kansas... Southwestern Geary County in east central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 1006 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Talmage, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Junction City, Abilene, Chapman, Solomon, Enterprise, Woodbine, Moonlight and Talmage. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 297. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
